categories: Category:Members of the Sphere of Ancient Knowledge
Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Ogathu was a corpulent Human male Sith Lord of the Sith Empire. During the Cold War with the Galactic Republic, he served inside Darth Skotia's bunker on the planet of Dromund Kaas. He was the warden of the Trandoshan relic that Darth Skotia used to control his Trandoshan bodyguards. He was killed by Lord Zash's apprentice when the Inquisitor infiltrated the base and bested him.
